info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44596
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44596
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 8, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro075001app411.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro093001app413.social.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	100 pro093001app060.social.gouv.fr.
